Package ec.id

Interface Summary
CapabilityReceiptInterface Interface defining contract that any capability receipt must satisfy.
CapabilityReceiver Interface for notification upon completion of a capability request/delivery protocol.
CapabilityRequestHandler CapabilityRequestHandlers are registered with the identity owner, to be called back when an appropriate request is received.
ECIdentityInterface Interface that defines the ECIdentity remote interface.
ID Root interface for basic identity equality.
ReachableID Interface defining basic 'resolveTo' method.
 

Class Summary
BaseCapability Abstract base class for all capabilities.
CapabilityReceipt Basic capability receipt.
ECID ID that is unique, persistant, and reachable.
ECIdentity Identity that exposes its remote interface through the RMI comm system.
ECIdentityOwner Actual IdentityOwner class for ECID. Instances of this class are created to get the local, privileged access to the local Identity (implemented by the ECIdentity class).
Identity An Identity object is a capability management point, providing capability drop off, capability requests and capability checking.
IdentityOwner An IdentityOwner is associated with a Identity, but is tightly held by the owner of the Identity.
PersistentCapability Persistent capability class.
RevocableCapability BaseCapability abstract subclass that implements basic revokability semantics.
StringID The StringID class is a convenient way of handing around a persistent reference to an identity.
 

Exception Summary
IdentityException Generic exception class for identity errors.
NullCapabilityException Exception class to represent access to a null capability
